attributes.action: Hold a General Election on the 15th October 2019.
attributes.additional_details:
There are many interviews held by Mr Cameron where it is clearly explained as to what a vote leave entailed, the government of the day had misjudged the mood of the country, the result being MP's acting out of self interest.
A General Election would allow the electorate to resolve this issue and bring credibility back to UK Politics.
attributes.background:
Failure of Parliament over the past 3yrs to agree  terms of how
the UK leaves the EU in full. Parliament ignored the result of the referendum stating that the electorate did not know what they voting for, Previous  Primeminister leave was leave and the UK would be operating on WTO rules.
